problem_text_cn: 如图,三棱柱ABC-A~1~B~1~C~1~的侧棱长和底面边长均为2,且侧棱AA~1~⊥底面ABC,其正(主)视图是边长为2的正方形,则此三棱柱侧(左)视图的面积为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the edge length and bottom side length of the triangular prism ABC-A~N_0~B~N_1~C~N_2~are both N_3, and the lateral edges AA~N_4~ ⊥ bottom surface ABC, the front(front) view is the side A square with length N_5, then the area of ​​the lateral(left) view of this triangular prism is ()
raw_answer: 解:易得三棱柱的底面为等边三角形,边长为2,作出等边三角形的高后,组成直角三角形,底边的一半为1,∴等边三角形的高为√{3},∴侧(左)视图的面积为2×√{3}=2√{3},故选:B．
